LanguageData.RC2_Everclear.label: Rectified Spirits
LanguageData.RC2_Everclear.description: Made from triple-distilled vodka, rectified spirits is 94% pure alcohol by volume. Great for cleaning appliances, wounds, or your insides, this potent alcohol is great for camping trips! Be warned though, this stuff'll knock the shit out of you if you drink it.
